pages.text: Created from a modified Leyden Jar array, these $(item)Power Cells$() can function as an emergency power source in the form of a rudimentary chemical reactor. As their name applies, these Cells can convert Chemical Fuel into usable electricity, perfect for small, hobbyist projects
Please contact a Miskatonic University Faculty Member to acquire a unit.
Formulated to work with Miskatonic-brand Power Cells, this simple recipe is only available to those affiliated with the University.
Primarily based upon crude ethanol mixed with select other ingredients, while safe to handle, it is NOT fit for human consumption.
